name: Same Place
description:
This is my first 3d puzzle horror game made with Godot Engine.

You play as Bill, a student at a boarding school, try to get outside to meet Bob at midnight. Be careful, don't get caught by the superintendent (Or administrator?).

The model of character is too complex to make and my computer refuses to run Blender smoothly. So yeah, the people in this game are all colored cylinders.

Have fun please!
